identity.name: E1
principles: Contrast: Organic curves vs. Technical grids

dashboard.card_style: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-xl border shadow-sm p-6

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-12 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-12 px-8 rounded-full font-medium
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 h-12 px-8 rounded-full font-medium

cards.feature: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-3xl bg-white p-8 shadow-soft hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 border border-border/50
cards.analysis: relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl bg-card border border-border shadow-sm

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-lg border-input bg-background px-4 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

hero.alt: Farmer using tablet in tomato field

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Outfit' font for all headings and 'Manrope' for body text.
Implement the 'Organic Precision' color palette. Note the off-white background.
For the Analysis Page, use a 'Medical Chart' layout: Plant image on left (sticky), data/diagnosis on right.
Use the 'Tracing Beam' effect (animated gradient border) for the active scanning state.
Use the provided image URLs for placeholders and hero sections.
Do not use generic 'SaaS Blue'. Stick to the Green/Terracotta/Bone palette.
For the 'Upload' area, make it a large, dashed-border dropzone with the 'upload_placeholder' image as a subtle background with overlay.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
